name: recall
description: This command returns values from the device memory (EEPROM). This includes values saved by the user (see Examples below for details) as well as values saved during factory calibration.  For a full list of saved values which can be recalled, see expr.cpp .  Expressions may be applied to "recall" requests ([more](https://github.com/Photosynq/PhotosynQ-Firmware/wiki/How-to-use-Expressions)).
